__NOTOC__

= Object Property: '$this.label$' =

'''URI''': ''$this$''

<div style="width:650px; padding-top:10px">
{{ #widget : TripleEditor
  | editMode = 'GROUPWISE'
  | clusterByDomain = false
  | propertyConfiguration = {{
   {{ property = 'rdfs:label'}} |
   {{ property = 'rdfs:comment' | componentType = 'TEXTAREA'}} }}
  | showUnfilledProperties = true
}}


== Domain and Range ==
This form allows editing of the range and domain definitions of this property.

<div style="width:650px; padding-top:10px">
{{ #widget : TripleEditor
  | editMode = 'GROUPWISE'
  | clusterByDomain = false
  | propertyConfiguration = {{
   {{ property = 'rdfs:range' | queryPattern = 'SELECT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type owl:Class }' | datatype = 'rdfs:Resource'}} |
   {{ property = 'rdfs:domain' | queryPattern = 'SELECT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type owl:Class }' | datatype = 'rdfs:Resource'}} }}
  | showUnfilledProperties = true
}}
</div>


== Taxonomy ==

This form allows editing of the taxonomic relations of this property.

<div style="width:650px; padding-top:10px">
{{ #widget : TripleEditor
  | editMode = 'GROUPWISE'
  | clusterByDomain = false
  | propertyConfiguration = {{
   {{ property = 'rdfs:subPropertyOf' | queryPattern = 'SELECT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty }' | datatype = 'rdfs:Resource'}} |
   {{ property = 'owl:equivalentProperty' | queryPattern = 'SELECT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty }' | datatype = 'rdfs:Resource'}} |
   {{ property = 'owl:inverseOf' | queryPattern = 'SELECT ?x WHERE { ?x rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty }' | datatype = 'rdfs:Resource'}} }}
  | showUnfilledProperties = true
}}
</div>


== Subproperties of this property ==

<div style="width:650px; padding-top:10px; padding-bottom:10px">
{{ #widget: TableResult
| query = 'SELECT ?subProperty WHERE { ?subProperty rdfs:subPropertyOf ?? }'
}}
</div>

== Triples with predicate $this.label$ ==

<div style="width:650px; padding-top:10px; padding-bottom:10px">
{{ #widget: TableResult
| query = 'SELECT ?subject ?object WHERE { ?subject ?? ?object }'
}}
</div>
